column2: According to article 77 of the General Data Protection Regulation ( GDPR ) you are entitled to the right of appeal to the supervisory authority without prejudice to any wider administrative or judicial remedy .
In addition to those rights , you have the right to lodge a complaint with relevant supervisory authorities .

How Can I Lodge a Complaint ?
We are committed to investigating and resolving complaints about our collection or use of your personal information .
To make a complaint , contact us at en_dataprotection @ trip.com .

You also have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority about our processing of your personal data ( for example for Berlin at the Berliner Beauftragte fr Datenschutz und Informationsfreiheit , email : mailbox @ datenschutz-berlin.de ) .
If you do not agree with the way we have processed your data or responded to your concerns , an alternative is to submit a complaint to a Data Protection Supervisory Authority .
